Name: Siddaramaiah
Tweet: This promise of BJP is vastly inferior to Raitha Belaku scheme I have announced in my 2018-19 budget with an outlay of Rs 3000 Cr. to provide Direct Income Support of Rs 5,000 to 10,000 to every dry land farmer regardless of the size of holding. 70 Lakh farmers will benefit  https://t.co/4dEEAYGMXl
